nodes.text: Feylis Ardele was a Human female pilot who served in the New Republic Defense Force during the Galactic Civil War.

Hailing from Commenor, Ardele was recruited into Rogue Squadron by Admiral Ackbar because of her expertise on the TIE Series fighters, following a recommendation from Ackbar's aide Rekush. Her family was executed by the Galactic Empire under suspect of being rebels. She soon fell in love with fellow Rogue Avan Beruss, but they hid their relationship from public knowledge.
